document.discussion_title: Two candidates for Hutto City Council differ on pace of growth
document.topic_text: Two candidates for Hutto City Council differ on pace of growth American-Statesman Monday 25th April, 2016 A paralegal and an account executive are running against each other for a place on the Hutto City Council.Tim Jordan and Bettina Jordan have the same last name, but are not related. They also both want to attract businesses to Hutto and mend fractured relationships that the city has with other agencies. But they differ on how rapidly they want the town to grow.They are seeking to replace Place 6 Council Member Max Yeste, who has chosen not to run again.Former school board President Doug Gaul is running unopposed for mayor. The current mayor, Debbie Holland, decided not to run again, citing dis...
